item.title: Debut novel - beta reading signup
item.description: This is a short and sweet post. I am looking for people interested in beta-reading my debut novel. Having a good group of beta-readers will allow me to make sure it’s as good as it can be before I send it to editors. You can get more information and sign up to be a beta reader here (beta reading signup is now closed.) I look forward to hearing from you.
